update oss_monitor_TimeInventory
OilNo = #{oilno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
StandardL = #{standardl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
HeightTotal = #{heighttotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
OilL = #{oill,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
HeightWater = #{heightwater,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
WaterL = #{waterl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Temperature = #{temperature,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
VolumeEmpty = #{volumeempty,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Temp1 = #{temp1,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Temp2 = #{temp2,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Temp3 = #{temp3,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Temp4 = #{temp4,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Temp5 = #{temp5,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Densities = #{densities,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
DensitiesStandard = #{densitiesstandard,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
TranStatus = #{transtatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Shift = #{shift,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OUCode = #{oucode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where OilCan = #{oilcan,jdbcType=INTEGER} and StoreTime = #{storetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and NodeNo = #{nodeno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update oss_monitor_TimeInventory set OilNo = #{oilno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, StandardL = #{standardl,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, HeightTotal = #{heighttotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, OilL = #{oill,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, HeightWater = #{heightwater,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, WaterL = #{waterl,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Temperature = #{temperature,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, VolumeEmpty = #{volumeempty,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Temp1 = #{temp1,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Temp2 = #{temp2,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Temp3 = #{temp3,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Temp4 = #{temp4,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Temp5 = #{temp5,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Densities = #{densities,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, DensitiesStandard = #{densitiesstandard,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, TranStatus = #{transtatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Shift = #{shift,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OUCode = #{oucode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where OilCan = #{oilcan,jdbcType=INTEGER} and StoreTime = #{storetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and NodeNo = #{nodeno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select * from ( select OilL,(SELECT MAX(StoreTime)),OUCode,(select OilType from oss_sysmanage_oilType where oss_sysmanage_oilType.OilNo=oss_monitor_TimeInventory.OilNo) AS OilType from oss_monitor_TimeInventory GROUP BY OUCode ) a where 1=1
and OUCode LIKE #{oucode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
